com.anthem.selenium.utils

Class ReadWordDocxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anthem.selenium.utils.ReadWordDocxUtils

  • public class ReadWordDocxUtils
extends Object
     This class provides methods for reading content from an MS Word document (.docx format only).
 .docx restriction is due to the file format change from Microsoft.
 Every Word document is a collection of Paragraphs and Tables.
 If you need to get Text use Paragraph methods.
 If you need table content use Table methods.
    Author:
    shiva.katua
    Usage : XWPFDocument docx = new XWPFDocument(new FileInputStream("c:/Anthem/aTAF.docx"));
    OR XWPFDocument docx = getWordDocx("c:/Anthem/aTAF.docx");
    eg:- getAllTables(docx)

      • getParagraphsCount

        public static Integer getParagraphsCount(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx)
         This method returns the count of paragraphs available in document.
 This method returns -1 if document is null.
 This method will return 1 if the document is empty also since every document has empty space considered as paragraph.
        Parameters:
        docx - Word Document
        Returns:
        Integer number of paragraphs in page

      • getAllParagraphsText

        public static List<String> getAllParagraphsText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx)
        This method returns all of the text in (Paragraphs excluding Tables) from a document as List of Strings.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object
        Returns:
        List List of Strings with each paragraph as String

      • getAllParagraphsTextAsString

        public static String getAllParagraphsTextAsString(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx)
        This method returns all paragraphs in the document as a Single String separated by line break (\n). This method returns "" (ApplicationConstants.EMPTY_STRING) if document is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object
        Returns:
        String text in the document file

                                                      String txtString)
        This method returns the Index of paragraph in document where the text is available. This method returns -1 if the matching paragraph is not found or invalid arguments.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object
        txtString - String to search in Paragraph
        Returns:
        Integer Index of Paragraph

      • getParagraphIndexContainingText

        public static Integer getParagraphIndexContainingText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                                      List<String> txtStrings)
        This method returns the Index of paragraph in document where the All of the text Strings is matching. This method returns -1 if the matching paragraph is not found or invalid arguments.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object
        txtStrings - List of Strings to be compared against paragraph
        Returns:
        Integer Index of Paragraph

      • getParagraphIndexContainingText

        public static Integer getParagraphIndexContainingText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                                      List<String> txtStrings,
                                                      boolean partialListMatch)
        This method returns the Index of paragraph in document where the text is matching based on whether to do partial Match or Full Match. This method returns -1 if the matching String(s) is not found or have provided invalid arguments.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object - Document
        txtStrings - List of Strings to be compared against paragraph
        partialListMatch - true for Matching subset of String in List
        Returns:
        Integer Index of Paragraph

                                                List<String> txtStrings,
                                                boolean partialListMatch)

        txtStrings - List of Strings to be compared against paragraph

      • getAllTables

        public static List<org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFTable> getAllTables(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx)
        This method returns all the tables (Tables excluding Paragraphs) from the document. To use this eg:- XWPFDocument docx = new XWPFDocument(new FileInputStream("c:/Anthem/aTAF.docx")); List tables = getAllTables(docx)
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object XWPFDocument
        Returns:
        List List of Tables

      • getTableIndexContainingText

        public static Integer getTableIndexContainingText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                                  List<String> txtStrings)
        This method returns the Index of the table in document where the full list of Strings are present in Table. This method returns -1 if the matching table is not found.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document
        txtStrings - array of text to identify in the table
        Returns:
        XWPFTable table in the XWPFDocument which contains all the txtString Strings

      • getTableIndexContainingText

        public static Integer getTableIndexContainingText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                                  List<String> txtStrings,
                                                  boolean partialListMatch)
        This method returns the Index of the table in document where the text is matching based on partial or Full Match. This method returns -1 if the matching table is not found or invalid arguments.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document
        txtStrings - array of text to identify the table
        partialListMatch - true for Matching subset of String in List
        Returns:
        Integer Table number in the document.

        Parameters:

        txtString - String text to identify the table
        Returns:
        Integer Index of Table in Document.

      • getTableCellText

        public static String getTableCellText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFTable table,
                                      int row,
                                      int col)
        This method returns the cell Text in the table at specific "row" and "column"
        Parameters:
        table - Table Object
        row - Row Number
        col - Column Number
        Returns:
        String cell text

      • getTableCellText

        public static String getTableCellText(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                      int tableIndex,
                                      int row,
                                      int col)
        This method returns the cell Text of specific "row" and "column" from the document in the table at tableIndex.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document
        tableIndex - Starts with "0"
        row - Starts with "0"
        col - Starts with "0"
        Returns:
        String Cell Text

      • getTableAsString

        public static String getTableAsString(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFTable table,
                                      String delimiter)
        This method returns all cell(s) Text from table separated with delimiter.
        Parameters:
        table - Table
        delimiter - default "~" if nothing (null) is provided.
        Returns:
        String Each Cell Text separated with "~" or provided delimiter.

      • getTableAsString

        public static String getTableAsString(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument docx,
                                      int tableIndex,
                                      String delimiter)
        This method returns the All Cell(s) Text from table at tableIndex in the document separated with delimiter.
        Parameters:
        docx - XWPFDocument Document Object
        tableIndex - starts with "0"
        delimiter - default "~" if nothing (null) is provided.
        Returns:
        String Table as String, Each Cell Text separated with "~" or provided delimiter.
